name: WithBot.recBotCoe_bot
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
C : WithBot α → Sort u_2
d : C Bot.bot
f : (a : α) → C ↑a
⊢ Eq (WithBot.recBotCoe d f Bot.bot) d
decl:
@[simp]
theorem recBotCoe_bot {C : WithBot α → Sort*} (d : C ⊥) (f : ∀ a : α, C a) :
    @recBotCoe _ C d f ⊥ = d :=
  rfl

name: WithBot.recBotCoe_coe
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
C : WithBot α → Sort u_2
d : C Bot.bot
f : (a : α) → C ↑a
x : α
⊢ Eq (WithBot.recBotCoe d f ↑x) (f x)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem recBotCoe_coe {C : WithBot α → Sort*} (d : C ⊥) (f : ∀ a : α, C a) (x : α) :
    @recBotCoe _ C d f ↑x = f x :=
  rfl
